mapper.select:
SELECT E.EQM_ID AS EQM_ID, E.EQM_NAME AS EQM_NAME, E.CHCK_PERD AS CHCK_PERD, P.PRCS_ID AS PRCS_ID, P.NM AS NM FROM EQM E LEFT OUTER JOIN PRCS P ON (E.EQM_ID = P.EQM_ID)
AND E.FG = F_COM_NM_TO_CODE(#{gubun})

SELECT A.*, E.EQM_NAME FROM ( SELECT O.*, R.RESN_NAME FROM EQM_NON_OPR O, EQM_NON_OPR_RESN R WHERE O.RESN_ID = R.RESN_ID AND O.EQM_ID = #{eqmId} ) A, EQM E WHERE A.EQM_ID = E.EQM_ID
AND TRUNC(NON_OPR_FR_TM) >= TO_CHAR(#{fromDate})
AND TRUNC(NON_OPR_TO_TM) <= TO_CHAR(#{toDate})
AND A.EQM_ID = #{eqmId}
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'EQMF-'|| TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD-')|| LPAD(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(EQM_NON_OPR_ID, -3))) +1, 3, 0) AS EQM_NON_OPR_ID FROM EQM_NON_OPR
INSERT INTO EQM_NON_OPR( EQM_NON_OPR_ID, EQM_ID, NON_OPR_FR_TM, REMK, NON_OPR_TO_TM, RESN_ID ) VALUES( #{eqmNonOprId} #{eqmId}, #{value}, #{remk}, sysdate, #{resnId} )
